Blitz handler commands
===========================

These commands handle operations pertaining to autogenerated Blitz snippets.

* :doc:`test_section` - Add a new Blitz test section
* :doc:`list` - Print autogenerated Blitz snippets
* :doc:`remove` - Delete autogenerated Blitz snippets
* :doc:`save` - Save autogenerated Blitz snippets into a testcase file

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:

   test_section
   list
   remove
   save
